STATEMENT

OF THE

Public Accounts

OF THE

NORTH-WEST TERRITORIES

FOR THE

Fourteen Months Ended August 31

1894

REGINA
JOHN ALEXANDER REID, QUEEN'S PRINTER FOR THE TERRITORIES
1897
To His Honour Charles Herbert Mackintosh, Lieutenant-Governor of the North-West Territories:

Sir,

I have the honour to submit a Statement of Receipts and Expenditure on account of the General Revenue Fund of the North-West Territories, for the fourteen months ending August 31, 1894.

I have the honour to be,

Sir,

Your obedient servant,

F. W. G. HAULTAIN,

For the Executive Committee.

NORTH-WEST GOVERNMENT OFFICES,
REGINA. September 10, 1895.
